zuzanDescr: Zuzan is a young and ambitious team developing Event Designer at www.zuzan.com. Our mission is to make the organization of any event anywhere in the world accessible to everyone. For users, the value of the Zuzan Designer is the ability to pick up a wide variety of artists for their holiday or meeting on the same site.

landing.everyDayWithZuzan: Celebrate life every day with Zuzan!
landing.becomeAPart: Become a part of an event of any scale. Choose an event, participate and find like-minded people around the world.
landing.organizeAHoliday: Manage a dream holiday - choose the best professionals from anywhere in the world.
landing.zuzanIsPlatform: Zuzan is a convenient event platform that can make your life more colourful.
landing.weCollectAll: We connected the best proffesionals from all over the world on one place so that you can conveniently and quickly get new emotions, gain useful skills and find new friends all around the world.
landing.youCanFindEverything: You can quickly and without extra costs find professionals and organize an event of any format anywhere in the world or create an online event without leaving your home and attract your audience.
landing.wantToCreateEvent: Want to create your own event?
